title: Help Us Win the Fight Against Motion Smoothing - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 12.05.18
description:
Now through December 25, get 30% off any 23andMe kit at http://23andme.com/morning

Start your trial month of Hims at http://forhims.com/morningshow

Go to http://lootcrate.com/kfms and enter my code KFMS to save 30% off your subscription

Andy and Nick spend a lot of time talking about Road Trip, watch a new clip from Aquaman, and talk about the dangers of letting your parents watch stuff with Motion Smoothing.

Time Stamps - 
-Aquaman clip teases what might be DC's badass cinematic fight yet (22:55 mins)
-Between two ferns getting a netflix movie (33:27 mins)
-Tom Cruise stars in impassioned PSA against motion smoothing (34:45 mins)
-Ron Burgandy is getting a podcast (42:06 mins)
Thanks to https://twitter.com/Kumailh for the timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
